original_title: Bile: When the Dead Come Home
overview: Dark industrial metal band Bile mix up live and promotional video work on WHEN THE DEAD COME HOME. Much of the live material has a bootleg feel to it, and is interspersed with some interesting backstage and behind the scenes footage. The concert footage is shot in New York City, and as the band hail from the Big Apple there is naturally a heightened sense of fervor from the audience and band alike.
title: Bile: When the Dead Come Home
